title: Educational Curriculum for Developing Attitudes Based on Religious Ethical Values

context.prior_knowledge: Basic religious ethics concepts and understanding of social skills and collaboration
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical religious ethics education to overcome emotional alienation caused by social distancing post-COVID-19

learning_goals: Understand and explain the four prophetic virtues (fathonah, siddiq, amanah, tabligh) through ADDIE model-based instruction
Cultivate attitudes that practice religious ethical values across knowing (cognition), doing (action), and being (existence) stages
Enhance social responsibility and trust-building capabilities through collaborative activities with peers
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
